snippet: Robert Griffin III, once an undisputed franchise player, has been given Washington’s starting quarterback job for the third time this season.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Washington Redskins announce that quarterback Robert Griffin III will start in upcoming game against Philadelphia Eagles; other football news noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and BILL PENNINGTON

lead_paragraph: Robert Griffin III, once an undisputed franchise player, has been given Washington’s starting quarterback job for the third time this season.

headline.print_headline: McCoy Out, Redskins Again Turn to Griffin
headline.main: McCoy Out, Redskins Again Turn to Griffin
